# Strings

Note: Functions taking `Tensor` arguments can also take anything accepted by
[`tf.convert_to_tensor`](../../api_docs/python/tf/convert_to_tensor.md).

[TOC]

<h2 id="Hashing">Hashing</h2>

String hashing ops take a string input tensor and map each element to an
integer.

*   [`tf.string_to_hash_bucket_fast`](../../api_docs/python/tf/string_to_hash_bucket_fast.md)
*   [`tf.string_to_hash_bucket_strong`](../../api_docs/python/tf/string_to_hash_bucket_strong.md)
*   [`tf.string_to_hash_bucket`](../../api_docs/python/tf/string_to_hash_bucket.md)

<h2 id="Joining">Joining</h2>

String joining ops concatenate elements of input string tensors to produce a new
string tensor.

*   [`tf.reduce_join`](../../api_docs/python/tf/reduce_join.md)
*   [`tf.string_join`](../../api_docs/python/tf/string_join.md)

<h2 id="Splitting">Splitting</h2>

*   [`tf.string_split`](../../api_docs/python/tf/string_split.md)
*   [`tf.substr`](../../api_docs/python/tf/substr.md)

<h2 id="Conversion">Conversion</h2>

*   [`tf.as_string`](../../api_docs/python/tf/as_string.md)
*   [`tf.string_to_number`](../../api_docs/python/tf/string_to_number.md)

*   [`tf.decode_raw`](../../api_docs/python/tf/decode_raw.md)
*   [`tf.decode_csv`](../../api_docs/python/tf/decode_csv.md)

*   [`tf.encode_base64`](../../api_docs/python/tf/encode_base64.md)
*   [`tf.decode_base64`](../../api_docs/python/tf/decode_base64.md)
